This package contains configuration files for commandline systems. Some scripts which are essentially aliases for existing commands are provided. Additionally, some of the contained data is only useful in conjunction with GUI systems but provided on CLI systems as well for reference purposes. . Not all packages needed to run all aliases etc. are listed as dependencies as these dependencies are expected to be declared by other MDVL packages.
